name: Black Diamond Zodiac Long Sleeve Flannel Shirt - Men's
description:
It doesn’t get much better than a comfy cotton flannel shirt, well it is better if the cotton is organic. Made from a rich organic cotton flannel, the Zodiac shirt is plaid perfection.Single chest pocket is just right for sunnies and cash.Relaxed fit for a casual all-day comfort that layers well.
